name: black-friday-promo
description: A comprehensive Black Friday promotional library with ribbons, banners, popups, countdown timers, and more. Zero dependencies, fully customizable.

scripts.build:demo: npm run build && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -r demo/* public/ && mkdir -p public/dist && cp -r dist/* public/dist/ && cp dist/black-friday-promo.min.js public/black-friday-promo.js && cleancss -o public/styles.css public/styles.css && terser public/app.js -o public/app.js && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o public/index.html public/index.html

author: Panayiotis Georgiou
